titleStmt.title: The falling stars or the dragons bringing down, and trampling upon heavenly glory. By John Eston, sometime fellow of Oriel Coll. Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Eston, John, 1625 or 6-1689.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "ffeb: 9th 1652"; 3 in imprint date crossed through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
